name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('./dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').mkdirSync('./dist');"
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-files.js
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
